00036   template<typename VarRef>
00037   void optimise_maximise_var(StateObj* stateObj, VarRef var)
00038   {
00039       getOptions(stateObj).findAllSolutions();
00040       getState(stateObj).setOptimiseVar(new AnyVarRef(var));
00041       getState(stateObj).setOptimisationProblem(true);
00042   }
00043   
00045   template<typename VarRef>
00046   void optimise_minimise_var(StateObj* stateObj, VarRef var)
00047   {
00048       getOptions(stateObj).findAllSolutions();
00049       getState(stateObj).setOptimiseVar(new AnyVarRef(VarNeg<VarRef>(var)));
00050       getState(stateObj).setOptimisationProblem(true);
00051   }
00052   
00054   template<typename T>
00055   void check_constraint(StateObj* stateObj, T* con)
00056   {
00057       vector<AnyVarRef>& variables = *(con->get_vars_singleton());
00058       unsigned vec_size = variables.size();  
00059       
00060     DomainInt* values = (DomainInt*) alloca(vec_size * sizeof(DomainInt)); 
00061       //vector<DomainInt> values(vec_size);
00062 
00063       for(unsigned loop = 0; loop < vec_size; ++loop)
00064       {
00065         if(!variables[loop].isAssigned())
00066         {
00067           cerr << "Some variables are unassigned. Unless you purposefully " <<
00068           "left them out, have a look." << endl;
00069           return;
00070         }
00071         values[loop] = variables[loop].getAssignedValue();
00072       }
00073       
00074       if(!con->check_assignment(values, vec_size))
00075       {
00076         cerr << "A " << con->constraint_name() << " constraint is not satisfied by this sol!" << endl;
00077         cerr << "The constraint is over the following variables:" << endl;
00078         for(unsigned loop = 0; loop < vec_size; ++loop)
00079           cerr << variables[loop] << ",";
00080         cerr << endl;
00081         cerr << "Variables were assigned:" << endl;
00082         for(unsigned loop = 0; loop < vec_size; ++loop)
00083           cerr << values[loop] << ",";
00084         cerr << endl;
00085         cerr << "This is an internal bug. It shouldn't happen!!" << endl;
00086         cerr << "Please report this instance to the developers." << endl;
00087         FAIL_EXIT();
00088       }
00089   }
00090 
00093   inline void check_sol_is_correct(StateObj* stateObj)
00094   {
00095     if(getOptions(stateObj).solCallBack)
00096       getOptions(stateObj).solCallBack(stateObj);
00097 
00098     vector<vector<AnyVarRef> > print_matrix = getState(stateObj).getPrintMatrix();
00099     
00100     getState(stateObj).incrementSolutionCount();
00101     if(getOptions(stateObj).solsoutWrite)
00102     {
00103       for(unsigned i = 0; i < print_matrix.size(); ++i)
00104         for(unsigned j = 0; j < print_matrix[i].size(); ++j)
00105         {
00106           if(!print_matrix[i][j].isAssigned())
00107             INPUT_ERROR("Some variable was unassigned while writing solution to file.");
00108           solsoutFile << print_matrix[i][j].getAssignedValue() << " ";
00109         }
00110       solsoutFile << "\n";
00111     }
00112     
00113     if(getOptions(stateObj).print_solution)
00114     {
00115       if(getOptions(stateObj).cspcomp)
00116       {
00117         cout << "v ";
00118         for(unsigned i = 0; i < print_matrix.size(); ++i)
00119           for(unsigned j = 0; j < print_matrix[i].size(); ++j)
00120           cout << print_matrix[i][j].getAssignedValue() << " ";
00121         cout << endl;
00122       }
00123       else if(!print_matrix.empty())
00124       {
00125         for(unsigned i = 0; i < print_matrix.size(); ++i)
00126         {
00127           if (!getOptions(stateObj).silent) cout << "Sol: ";  
00128           for(unsigned j = 0; j < print_matrix[i].size(); ++j)
00129           {
00130             if(!print_matrix[i][j].isAssigned())
00131               cout  << "[" << print_matrix[i][j].getMin() << "," << 
00132               print_matrix[i][j].getMax() << "]";
00133             else
00134               cout << print_matrix[i][j].getAssignedValue() << " ";
00135           }
00136           cout << endl;
00137         }
00138         if (!getOptions(stateObj).silent) cout << endl;
00139       }
00140 
00141     // TODO : Make this more easily changable.
00142       if (!getOptions(stateObj).silent) 
00143       {
00144         cout << "Solution Number: " << getState(stateObj).getSolutionCount() << endl;
00145         getState(stateObj).getOldTimer().printTimestepWithoutReset(Output_Always, "Time:");
00146         cout << "Nodes: " << getState(stateObj).getNodeCount() << endl << endl;
00147       }
00148     }
00149 
00150     if(!getOptions(stateObj).nocheck)
00151     {
00152       for(unsigned i = 0 ; i < getState(stateObj).getConstraintList().size();i++)
00153         check_constraint(stateObj, getState(stateObj).getConstraintList()[i]);
00154     }
00155   }
00156 
00157    
00159   inline bool do_checks(StateObj* stateObj)
00160   {
00161     if(getState(stateObj).getNodeCount() == getOptions(stateObj).nodelimit)
00162       return true;
00163     
00164     if(getState(stateObj).isAlarmActivated())
00165     {
00166       getState(stateObj).clearAlarm();
00167       if(getState(stateObj).isCtrlcPressed())
00168         return true;
00169 
00170       if(getOptions(stateObj).time_limit != 0)
00171       {
00172         if(getState(stateObj).getOldTimer().checkTimeout(getOptions(stateObj).time_limit))
00173         {
00174           if(getOptions(stateObj).cspcomp)
00175           {
00176             FAIL_EXIT("Time out");
00177           }
00178           
00179           getOptions(stateObj).printLine("Time out.");
00180           getTableOut().set("TimeOut", 1);
00181             return true;
00182         }
00183       }
00184     }
00185     return false;
00186   }

00189 template<typename T>
00190 void inline maybe_print_search_state(StateObj* stateObj, const char* name, T& vars)
00191 {
00192   if(getOptions(stateObj).dumptree)
00193     cout << name << getState(stateObj).getNodeCount() << "," << get_dom_as_string(vars) << endl;
00194 }
00195 
00196 void inline maybe_print_search_action(StateObj* stateObj, const char* action)
00197 {
00198     // used to print "bt" usually
00199     if(getOptions(stateObj).dumptree)
00200         cout << "SearchAction:" << action << endl;
00201 }

00203   void inline deal_with_solution(StateObj* stateObj)
00204   {
00205     // We have found a solution!
00206     check_sol_is_correct(stateObj);
00207     
00208     if(getState(stateObj).isOptimisationProblem())
00209     {
00210       if(!getState(stateObj).getOptimiseVar()->isAssigned())
00211       {
00212         cerr << "The optimisation variable isn't assigned at a solution node!" << endl;
00213         cerr << "Put it in the variable ordering?" << endl;
00214     cerr << "Aborting Search" << endl;
00215         exit(1);
00216       }
00217       
00218       cout << "Solution found with Value: " 
00219       << getState(stateObj).getOptimiseVar()->getAssignedValue() << endl;
00220       
00221       getState(stateObj).setOptimiseValue(getState(stateObj).getOptimiseVar()->getAssignedValue() + 1);         
00222     }
00223     // Note that sollimit = -1 if all solutions should be found.
00224     if(getState(stateObj).getSolutionCount() == getOptions(stateObj).sollimit)
00225       throw EndOfSearch();
00226   }
00227 
00228   void inline set_optimise_and_propagate_queue(StateObj* stateObj)
00229   {
00230     if(getState(stateObj).isOptimisationProblem())
00231       getState(stateObj).getOptimiseVar()->setMin(getState(stateObj).getOptimiseValue());
00232     getQueue(stateObj).propagateQueue();
00233   }
00234 
00235   void inline initalise_search(StateObj* stateObj)
00236   {
00237     getState(stateObj).setSolutionCount(0);  
00238     getState(stateObj).setNodeCount(0);
00239     
00240     if(!getOptions(stateObj).noTimers)
00241     {
00242     getState(stateObj).setupAlarm();
00243     install_ctrlc_trigger(stateObj);
00244     }
00245     lock(stateObj);
00246     if (!getOptions(stateObj).silent) 
00247       getState(stateObj).getOldTimer().printTimestepWithoutReset(Output_1, "First Node Time: ");
00249     if(getState(stateObj).isFailed())
00250       return;
00251     if(getState(stateObj).isOptimisationProblem())
00252       getState(stateObj).setOptimiseValue(getState(stateObj).getOptimiseVar()->getMin()); 
00253   }
00254 }
